items.title: Former ULA Chief Tory Bruno Roped In At Bezos’ Blue Origin Amid Intensifying Launch Race
items.description: Tory will serve as President of Blue Origin’s newly formed national security group.

items.title: Sable Offshore Stock Eyes Worst Day In A Month As Lawsuit Targets Trump Administration’s Pipeline Restart Approval
items.description: The stock pullback reflects renewed uncertainty around regulatory and legal hurdles tied to Sable’s main producing asset.

items.title: American Airlines Stock Slides As Winter Storm Chaos Cancels Over 1,500 Flights During Holiday Rush
items.description: Airline operations were tested at the height of holiday travel as severe weather forced carriers to juggle disruptions.
